trans-unit.source: Implements an ASP.NET module that processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 實作處理 WS-同盟案例中的工作階段 cookie 的 ASP.NET 模組。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property is initialized to a default instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A>屬性設定為`false`和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>屬性會初始化為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>類別</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>的預設執行個體</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>的</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the incoming request by validating the incoming session token.
trans-unit.target: 驗證內送工作階段權杖來驗證傳入的要求。

trans-unit.source: Upon successful validation, it updates the current HTTP context and thread principal with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 成功驗證後，它會更新目前的 HTTP 內容和執行緒主體具有指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken 方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A> method to validate the incoming token and update the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A>方法以驗證連入權杖和更新<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `writeCookie` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A> method is invoked to write the session token to a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果`writeCookie`參數是`true`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A>方法被叫用的工作階段權杖寫入 cookie。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token to use to authenticate the incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 要用來驗證傳入的 HTTP 要求的工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write the session cookie; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要撰寫工作階段 cookie。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a session cookie is in the specified cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否在指定的 cookie 集合中的工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The collection of cookies in which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜尋的 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a session cookie is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果找到工作階段 cookie否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: httpCookieCollection is null
trans-unit.target: httpCookieCollection為 null

trans-unit.source: Gets the active <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The active session security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用中工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cookie handler that is used to read, write, and delete session cookies.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來讀取、 寫入和刪除工作階段 cookie 的 cookie 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The CookieHandler property is initialized by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Requiressl 屬性已由初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the property based on the cookie handler specified on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is set on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會初始化基礎上指定的 cookie 處理常式屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件上設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can set the cookie handler in a configuration file through the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過組態檔中設定的 cookie 處理常式[ \< Requiressl\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: 此 cookie 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from the specified parameters by using the configured session token handler.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>從指定的參數使用設定的工作階段權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The principal to be captured in the token.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之權杖中的主體。

trans-unit.source: An application-defined context string.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式定義的內容字串。

trans-unit.source: The first instant in which this token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 此權杖是有效的第一個瞬間。

trans-unit.source: The last instant in which this token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 此權杖是有效的最後一個瞬間。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value should be persisted by the user agent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此值應保存使用者代理程式;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The session token.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段權杖。

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: 不是有效的工作階段權杖處理常式設定。

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (沒有任何<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref>中設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>屬性。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Deletes the session cookie and removes it from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 刪除工作階段 cookie，並從快取中移除。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the session cookie by using the cookie handler specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 cookie 處理常式中刪除工作階段 cookie<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during sign-out by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 期間會呼叫這個方法由登出<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle events from the module's [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] application object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化模組，並準備好要處理事件從模組的[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]應用程式物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A> handlers to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> events of the application object specified by the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A>處理常式，<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>所指定的應用程式物件的事件`context`參數。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP application object that contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 包含此模組的 HTTP 應用程式物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module properties based on definitions in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化根據組態檔中定義的模組屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property from the handler specified in configuration by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName> object that is set on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>從組態中指定的處理常式屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName>物件上設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the cookie handler in a configuration file through the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過組態檔中指定的 cookie 處理常式[ \< Requiressl\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the session information (claim values, etc.) should be stored in the session cookie or whether the session content should be stored on the server side, using the cookie to store just a reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否要將工作階段資訊 （宣告值等） 儲存工作階段 cookie，或在伺服器端，使用 cookie 儲存 just 參考是否應該儲存工作階段內容中。

trans-unit.source: In reference mode, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> is stored in a server-side cache (an object that derives from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>).
trans-unit.target: 在參考模式中，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>會儲存在伺服器端快取 (衍生自物件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The issued cookie just contains a context identifier that is used to retrieve the token from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 發行的 cookie 只會包含用來從快取中擷取語彙基元，為內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the token passed in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 參考模式中操作 Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName>global.asax.cs 檔案，並在設定中的事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性對這個語彙基元傳入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the IsReferenceMode property on the Session Authentication Module.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保工作階段權杖仍會為每個要求的參考模式運作，並位於偏好只 IsReferenceMode 上將屬性設定工作階段驗證模組。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if issued cookies are in reference mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已發行的 cookie 中參考的模式;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which specifies that issued cookies are not in reference mode.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，以指定發行 cookie 不在參考的模式。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest"></xref> event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest"></xref>事件從[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]管線。

trans-unit.source: This method does the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會進行下列作業︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> method to read a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> from the session cookie, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>方法來讀取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>從工作階段 cookie，如果有的話。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a session security token cannot be read (most likely because a session has not been established), return.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作階段安全性權杖不能讀取 （很可能是由於工作階段尚未建立），就會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A>方法，以引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>事件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides an opportunity for the token read from the cookie to be modified or for the request to be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供一個機會，讀取要修改的 cookie 語彙基元或取消要求。

trans-unit.source: The handler can also specify that the token should be reissued, by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式也可以指定的語彙基元應該重新發出，藉由設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the token is to be reissued, removes it from the cache and invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果語彙基元來重新發出，從快取中移除，並叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A>方法，以引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>事件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides opportunity for the token to again be modified.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供要一次修改的語彙基元的機會。

trans-unit.source: The reissue behavior can also be modified by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 請重新發出行為也可以藉由設定修改<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>事件處理常式中的屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>方法來驗證使用者。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: If successful, this has the effect of setting the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the principal that is contained in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the incoming token.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，這已設定的效果<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>主體中所包含的屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>連入權杖的屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the session has expired, invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作階段已過期，會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnAuthenticateRequest method is added to the handlers for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> event in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: OnAuthenticateRequest 方法加入的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>中的事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This will be an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這會是<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: 不是有效的工作階段權杖處理常式設定。

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (沒有任何<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref>中設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>屬性。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest"></xref> event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest"></xref>事件從[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]管線。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作是空的。

trans-unit.source: The OnPostAuthenticateRequest handler is added to the handlers for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> event in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: OnPostAuthenticateRequest 處理常式加入的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>中的事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This will be an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這會是<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignedOut"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignedOut"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method after the sign-out has been performed and the session cookie has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法之後登出已執行，而且已刪除的工作階段 cookie。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SigningOut"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SigningOut"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method to perform sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法，以執行登出。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is invoked before the session cookie is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除工作階段 cookie 之前，它會叫用。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method if an error occurs during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>登出期間發生錯誤時的方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Reads a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from the specified session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 讀取<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>從指定的工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The cookie, in raw form, that contains the session token.
trans-unit.target: 未經處理的格式，其中包含工作階段權杖中的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The session token that was read from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 已從 cookie 讀取工作階段權杖。

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: 不是有效的工作階段權杖處理常式設定。

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (沒有任何<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref>中設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>屬性。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a session security token has been created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立工作階段安全性權杖時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to modify the session security token before it is written to a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的工作階段安全性權杖寫入 cookie 之前，您可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: The SessionSecurityTokenCreated event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been created.
trans-unit.target: SessionSecurityTokenCreated 引發內<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>方法之後的工作階段語彙基元 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) 已建立。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: This happens, for example, if an event handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event modifies the token.
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況，例如，如果事件處理常式<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>事件修改語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的工作階段權杖的內容，然後再進一步沿著管線傳遞和用來驗證要求 （使用者） 的實體，您可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can access the token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在事件處理常式，您可以存取透過語彙基元<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在修改後權杖，您可以確保，它就會寫入 cookie 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Unlike, the SessionSecurityTokenCreated event, SessionSecurityTokenCreated is not a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: SessionSecurityTokenCreated 事件，SessionSecurityTokenCreated 不像可取消事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a session security token has been read from a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 發生於已從 cookie 讀取工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets the principal on the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> to the principal that is contained in the specified session token.
trans-unit.target: 在設定主體<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>和<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>包含在指定的工作階段權杖的主體。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A> method and sets the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> using the identities that are returned.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A>方法和集合<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用傳回的身分識別。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session token from which to set the principal.
trans-unit.target: 要設定主體工作階段權杖。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the user is signed out.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者登出之後。

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method just after the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 從引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法之後<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>叫用方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before deleting the sign-in session.
trans-unit.target: 刪除登入工作階段之前，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method just before the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 從引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>方法之前<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>叫用方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Signs the current user out and raises the associated events.
trans-unit.target: 登出目前的使用者，並引發相關聯的事件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A> methods to perform sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A>方法以執行登出。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A> method is invoked to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A>方法會叫用來引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError>事件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> object passed into the event handler for this event to cancel the sign-out and prevent the exception from being propagated to the client.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs>物件傳遞至這個事件來取消登出，並防止傳播至用戶端所造成的例外狀況的事件處理常式。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to add application-specific behavior.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法可加入應用程式特有的行為。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an error during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 登出期間發生錯誤時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method when an error occurs during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: 從引發<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>登出期間發生錯誤時的方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can get the exception that resulted in the event being raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在事件處理常式，您可以取得所產生的事件所引發的例外狀況<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel further processing of the exception, which has the result of not propagating the exception to the client, by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以進一步的結果為未設定傳播至用戶端，例外狀況的例外狀況處理來取消<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs>至`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to read a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from a session cookie and returns a value that indicates whether the session cookie was successfully read.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>從工作階段 cookie，並傳回值，指出是否已成功讀取工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Reads the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property and then invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> method to read the token from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 會使用 cookie 處理常式中設定的讀取 cookie<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>屬性然後再叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>方法來讀取從 cookie 語彙基元。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the session security token that was read from the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含已從工作階段 cookie 讀取工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the session cookie was successfully read from the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功從要求讀取工作階段 cookie否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> and returns its identities.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>並傳回其身分識別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法從呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: It invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the configured session token handler to validate the token and extract its identities.
trans-unit.target: 它會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法設定的工作階段權杖處理常式驗證權杖，並擷取其身分識別。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The token to validate.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The collection of identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: 在權杖中所包含的身分識別的集合。

trans-unit.source: The token has expired.
trans-unit.target: 權杖已過期。

trans-unit.source: The token start time is not yet valid.
trans-unit.target: 權杖的開始時間尚未生效。

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: 不是有效的工作階段權杖處理常式設定。

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (沒有任何<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref>中設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>屬性。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> to a session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 寫入指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>工作階段 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Writes the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中設定的 cookie 處理常式寫入 cookie<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的工作階段安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: sessionToken is .
trans-unit.target: sessionTokenis .

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: 不是有效的工作階段權杖處理常式設定。

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (沒有任何<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref>中設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>屬性。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>
